typograhpy: Through CSS3 we get introduced to the rem unit. The rem unit allows us to specify the font-size relative to the root element, the html element. The default rem is set to 10px, stag sets this value to 16px.
blockquote: Use blockquotes to cite sections from other sources.
button: Button are styled from their default look. Stag provides 3 styles; There default, outlined and clear. Stag also provides and additional disabled state
code: You can use code elements to represet snippets of code. There are inline and block level stylings. When using a block level code block wrap it in a pre element.
divider: Stag provides styles for hr as a way to section of content. There is a default and long style.
form: All basic form elements are styled for clarity on both desktop and mobile platforms.
grid: Stag provides a 4 column grid system. It comes with intuitive class names and an automatic column view on mobile devices
list: Stag provides styles for all 3 basic list types; unordered list ul, ordered list ol, and description list dl
table: Tables are used to display collections of data in a two dimentional format. Stag makes tables responsive by default for presnce of mind
